Reviews.Title: Its good..!!
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone as a back up (I live in a storm struck region) - The phone feels light and has a good form factor. - A full charge lasts for 2 days (provided u adjust the screen brightness and other battery requiring functions). - The music buttons on top of the phone are a bit annoying. There is no way to quickly see the time on the cover display. - It has customized charging ports which are also you headphone ports. So I bought additional headphones. The music sounds great. - The buttons are large and convenient. The shortcut keys may need customization. - Also had to buy a memory card. This is not a standard SD card but a proprietary M2 card which also means you will have to buy its adapter if you wish to transfer music form your computer.Final word: though it requires some additional accessories. I still like it as a basic phone. Works well, and the calls are clear and audible.

Reviews.Title: Good receiver and range
Reviews.Author: Randy D. Lasater "baja 250"
Reviews.Content: This Phone is a good Flip phone for a guy that does not want a I phone.  I just like to talk and if I need to take a picture this thing has a good camera.  I was impressed with the quality.  Not all digitals are the same.  It has some funky ringtones on the phone also.  I bought an extra battery.  They are cheap.  I will use for a while and save for an extra.  You never know.  Plus I don't like to walk around with a mini computer tracking my every move.  I suppose I am old fashioned.  Works for me,, Thanks

Reviews.Title: Works 100%
Reviews.Author: John J. Salafia
Reviews.Content: I was abit leary of purchasing a cell phone online but had asked a few questions of the seller before purchain this phone.This is my 3rd W518a,I have had 2 contracts with AT&T; and have 1 every 2 years (my 2nd is still working).I tried AT&T; but they do not sell this phone,or the battery,anylonger.I liked this model so I decided to purchase it and I am 100% satisfied that I did.It works Extremely well and since I purchased it from a compant other than AT&T; I still am contract free!

Reviews.Title: purchase  Sony Ericsson  W518 Walkmanl
Reviews.Author: mjbrown
Reviews.Content: I have tried to purchase a used Sony Ericsson W518a Cell Phone for about since January this year. The reason the orignal phone gave me was problem with the charger,it stop working. Thought it was battery, bought new one ,still didn't work, so tried new charger .it did not make the phone work either. So, tried to purchase another.  Got one on ebay great price, but once I got it the lite didn't work. it was full charged everything except.when you open the flip phone lite flash..then out lite...so, thanks I didn't stop I just wanted my Sony Ericsson phone back.. Then I tried Amazon.com I received great price..and working. excellent cell phone with no problem. Thank You to the seller.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: timothy weiss
Reviews.Content: I owned another Walkman w518a for over three years until I broke it  I ordered the very same one.  Durable and reliable  I use it every single day and has never failed me yet. Congrats to Sony Ericsson for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Out dated phone!
Reviews.Author: George DeJesus
Reviews.Content: Had problem with sim card operation first, then got a replacement and that phone could not get a signal from just about anywhere, phone sucks!

Reviews.Title: ericsson
Reviews.Author: kenny55
Reviews.Content: great phone for the ones who are not into texting and web.  can use when walking,andjogging to listen to music

Reviews.Title: great phone good price
Reviews.Author: kiscoama
Reviews.Content: because this phone is the best. i have one already so i bought these three for my family. Thanks.I will buy it again in the future

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Jaime M.
Reviews.Content: It wasnt working after 15 days of the purchase I m so dissapointedYou should review your items before sell it

Reviews.Title: Bad choose
Reviews.Author: Wiilks
Reviews.Content: This was a phone for a present, and I sent it abroad, but the phone even with the full charge goes off. The phone just didn't work. Turns on ok and then when they opened for answer a call goes off. And there's nothing I can do because is in another part of the world.

Reviews.Title: Good job
Reviews.Author: Christopher George
Reviews.Content: Sent from China, apparently, once it arrived it had EVEN MORE accessories than I expected.  Good buy.  High quality.  Completely new and NOT refurbished.  Muy bien.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Joel Peters
Reviews.Content: good phone if you only want to talk, its very cheap, good quality , nothing more to say , excellent

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Phone If You Get It Brand New
Reviews.Author: Laina
Reviews.Content: The phone is great.  I got this to replace the one I had for the past 3 years, because I thought it was broken.  Unfortunately, the one I purchased was refurbished, not new as advertised.  It died after about a month.  Thankfully Amazon took it back and gave me a refund.  So I took put my SIM card back in my original phone and haven't had a problem since.  So I highly recommend this phone.  After 4 years of rough use, it's still working wonderfully.  Just email the seller before buying to make sure that it is actually new first.

Reviews.Title: Always loved this flip phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Blevins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this one because I had one just liked it before and it had died. Before I called it quits with my old one I ordered a new OEM battery to see if I could bring life back into it.  Didn't work,  New battery didn't help.  I got the new phone, plugged it up to charge and then it didn't work.  Had it on the charger for two days and was not holding a charge.  So I took the new battery I purchased and changed it out with the what was supposed to be a new phone and battery and it worked.  No problems what so ever.  This phone is a good old school flip phone.  I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift!
Reviews.Author: Karen Bowles
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone as a gift to my daughter.  She had one and liked it's operation, so we replaced it when her old one quit working.  Don't know anything about the phone other than she liked it.

Reviews.Title: Sim card unfound problem is hard to deal
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: After sim card is inserted. It's keep searching Network or saying no sim card several times a day. Yes, it's a common problem for Sony cellphone. But it's vendor's responsibility to check it before selling the device.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: roy
Reviews.Content: it fails a lot and shuts down by itself a lot and and is not reliable. Do not recommend it

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Martin F.
Reviews.Content: It was a great gift for my mother she's not every in to technology so she loved this phone. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Thomas Johnson
Reviews.Content: Still have it and it replaced my old cell phone and would not go back to another.  Recommend it to family and friands.

Reviews.Title: Reasonably priced, no frills.
Reviews.Author: James G. Bruen Jr.
Reviews.Content: This is a reasonably priced no frills basic cell phone. It works well for voice calls, photos, and text messaging. When used as a speaker phone it's okay. The phone's not much use for the internet, but the button for accessing the internet is so prominent that at first you may use it inadvertently, triggering unwanted data usage charges. A batterty charge can last several days.We got three of these phones (one black, two red) initially. They all performed well and lasted well beyond the life of the ATT contract. We went month to month thereafter since ATT had increased the price we'd have to pay under a new contract. Eventually one of the red phones broke due to hard treatment. We replaced it with another of the black phones for under $60 on Amazon. If we'd gone under contract again using the contract most similar to the terms we now have to get three new phones, the minimum cost to us would have been $240 additional over two years. (It'd also be a good purchase if you needed an inexpensive phone to bridge the gap from the time you lose a phone to the expiration of your contract when you can "reup" and get a glitzier phone as part of your contract.)A caution: The first replacement phone (red) we got through Amazon was inferior to the ones we had initially (poor sound; no pictures would come through on texts); no internet connection; when we worked unsuccessfully with ATT to correct these problems, ATT gave up and decided to provide warranty coverage instead. Then we (and the ATT rep) learned the warranty had expired. Though the phone had been advertised as new, it in fact was used, first activated on the ATT network almost two years earlier. We're guessing someone was dissatisfied with it and returned it under warranty (it still looked great) with its original packaging, and thereafter someone palmed it off as new. We returned it to Amazon and got another (black).

Reviews.Title: Inactive sim issue
Reviews.Author: D G "USA"
Reviews.Content: I bought the red version for a relative and it worked fine with O2 Sim card, previous simple flip phone finally went bad considering that it was several years old.  Decided to get the grey version for myself as a backup phone liking its simplicity.1st issue like the first phone the random music playing, simply leave the lock slider on.  Also decided to erase any MP3 on my relatives phone lol, she did not need that.2nd issue - inactive Sim, appeared random but would constantly go inactive.  Searched the sony forum which I found similar issues claiming a bad Sim. Since I had the red version to test I was able to swap Sims and worked fine on red, but both Sims would not work on grey model.  An article on Sony site mentions the Sim cable may come loose and simply re-seating it would fix it.[...] getting the tools on amazon 6$ and followed it.15min to disassemble and back if you have the tools.  The connector is next to the Sim slot under a square foam, lift up and place back down.  Now it works fine. No missing Sim message.For now I am going to wait to see if the other issues listed here occur before changing my 3 rating. Freezing calls, battery life etc.So far so good. Bluetooth works with my wireless headset, as my alternative MP3 player to my main android phone.  The size makes it easy to stash anywhere on myself or bag.

Reviews.Title: bad phone!
Reviews.Author: Delano
Reviews.Content: This phone is not good! The volume goes out and comes back on with a tap! I wasted my money on this phone!!!

Reviews.Title: Black W518a Cellphone
Reviews.Author: gene roach
Reviews.Content: Pictures fuzzy and I could not get the camera to work. Doesnot work as good as the red model.

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson W518 Phone
Reviews.Author: mr_machinist
Reviews.Content: It's okay, not exactly as good as the one I bought originally. It seems to have lots of echoes. It doesn't come with the original user manual.

Reviews.Title: One works, the 2nd lasted 2 weeks.  Hope the one I kept keeps working.
Reviews.Author: Lois Nelson
Reviews.Content: Had to return one of the phones because it quit working properly almost immediately.  Hoping the other keeps on working, otherwise, I can't return it now.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: David Root
Reviews.Content: Love the phone has all the bells and whisltes of a 3g phone without the price. Battery charges quickly and holds the charge all day long. Very happy with my phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone or battery..
Reviews.Author: I. Deoliveira "Shopping in NJ"
Reviews.Content: The phone turns off by itself. This happens on almost a daily basis.When it is on the battery does not even last the day.And I do not use all the functions. I just wanted a simpler flip phone.Not satisfied and am attempting to return. I do not recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work after 1 week of use
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: The phone turns off by itself, if I am using it it freezes. up and have to turn it off and back on in order to keep working.I would not recommend this phone, a really bad experience for me

Reviews.Title: A little out dated but OK
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: The only thing is that AT@T did not have any of the accessories because they don't carry this product anymore. Besides that it does what it's supposed to do and you can find all the accessories on line.

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson W518a Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph Kent Grenzebach
Reviews.Content: The "music" would come while it was being carried in my pocket, could not figure out a way to turn it off.  Went in to an AT&T; store, they had a guy who remembered this phone, said there is no way to "turn it off" regarding the music, but he was able to delete all of the songs.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Laurie A. Weber
Reviews.Content: would have liked to get this in a pink phone, but unfortunately it doesn't come in pink:(  Works very well good long battery life

Reviews.Title: Disappointing!!!
Reviews.Author: nash
Reviews.Content: Purchased 3 of these phones as presents for Christmas and one of the item is not working. The three phones came without data cables and headsets. The box of the phones were scratched and wall charger packaging were old looking with holes. It's so disappointing because this is the third time i have received items with issues. i'm so sick and fedup of amazon. Don not order this phone its rejected stuff. Amazon only sells used and rejected stuff now cause that is all i have been receiving. I'm so embarrassed because i purchased this item as a present and now its not working. Gosh i'm sick of it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Avoid this phone
Reviews.Author: dd
Reviews.Content: The phone turns off unexpectedly even when there is reception. Music starts playing on it for some reason as if it is possessed.  Now it freezes, the phone is ringing yet it is turned off. The battery is no good. You can fully charge the battery and then two  minutes later it tells you the battery is low.  The worst phone ever!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: mightyfriend
Reviews.Content: We are satisfied with the product, but it was delivered late.  Good product for what we need.  Good deal for the money.  We give it a 4 star!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted, in perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Steve Covault
Reviews.Content: I have used this same phone for many years and it is perfect for my use. Was delivered ahead of time and in perfect condition!!!

Reviews.Title: Great with my Ford Sync
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I like this phone because it works with my Ford sync and it is just the simple kind of phone I need since I don't text or use internet.

Reviews.Title: i gave some one and he did not like it
Reviews.Author: Saeed Younis
Reviews.Content: i dont like this stuffs i think when you buy it you gonna hate it  like i did so only thing is price and shipping, better stuffs if they fix it, i will be more happy next time.

Reviews.Title: Could not charge phone.
Reviews.Author: CA "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Sony Ericsson W518a from BytesOfDeals to use on a trip to Vietnam and was going to give it to a friend over there when i left. But i couldn't charge the phone, displayed an error when trying to charge the battery. So i was without a phone for 98% of my visit. I found someone with a universal battery charger so i was able to charge it right at the end of my trip. The phone work fine while i had a charge so I can't fault the phone, rather Amazon who couldn't do anything to replace the phone charger because i was gone for a month. All they could do was offer a discount on a replacement charger. I did try to charge the phone when I got back to the US but it still wouldn't but this time it said the battery was not a Sony Ericsson battery which it was clearly stated on the battery when i looked at it. So i won't buy a phone from Amazon or BytesOfDeals again.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected and it had no charger.
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: no charger and not what i expected. i expected a blacberry phone not a sonny E. stinks i need info to send it back

Reviews.Title: Frozen when receiving a call
Reviews.Author: S. Tse "A web app developer"
Reviews.Content: It was great for a non-smart phone.  But after 4 months, it freezes whenever receiving a call.  I tried turn off/on, remove and put the battery back, download the latest OS/Firmware, still no luck.  I gave up and bought another phone.

Reviews.Title: Screen died after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Stephan Deibel
Reviews.Content: The screen stopped working after 6 months, even though I rarely use (or even carry around) my cell phone.  Also the "unlock buttons" message scrolling in the small outer screen is incredibly annoying the Nth time when I'm just trying to see the time.  I would avoid this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: honeybear
Reviews.Content: Nice quality, thanks! It works well and takes nice pictures. It was worth the price, which was very reasonable! Thanks

Reviews.Title: I love my phone
Reviews.Author: V.Q.M
Reviews.Content: November 25, 2012 By MovieLoverFirst of all I love this phone because because of the long battery life. I can talk on it for hours and still have more than 1/2 of the charge left on the phone. I can go for days without charging after a full charge. The pictures turn out great for such a simple phone. And the only reason I have this phone is to talk and sometimes text :) While other fancy phone users I.e IPhone users are looking for a outlet to charge their phone for an important call so they can talk.... I just smile and think I love my simple little phone. By the way I bought an extra phone since ATT doesn't sell them anymore.

ProductInfo.Features:
This is an unlocked GSM device and will not work on CDMA networks like Verizon or Sprint.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson Walkman W518a Unlocked GSM Phone with 3.2MP Camera, GPS and Bluetooth - Black
